publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4050 Ms Rosemary Byrne: Renaming of Prestwick International Airport—That the Parliament supports the call for Prestwick International Airport to be renamed Robert Burns Airport in memory of our national bard and agrees that this change of name will enhance the continuing development of the Burns Heritage Trail and tourism in the south of Scotland. Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support

S2M-4050 Ms Rosemary Byrne: Renaming of Prestwick International Airport—That the Parliament supports the call for Prestwick International Airport to be renamed Robert Burns Airport in memory of our national bard and agrees that this change of name will enhance the continuing development of the Burns Heritage Trail and tourism in the south of Scotland.
S2M-4050 Renaming of Prestwick International Airport (lodged on 2 March 2006) Donald Gorrie*
S2M-4050 Renaming of Prestwick International Airport (lodged on 2 March 2006) Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Colin Fox*, Fiona Hyslop*, Tommy Sheridan*
S2M-4050 Renaming of Prestwick International Airport (lodged on 2 March 2006) Rosie Kane*, Margaret Jamieson*, Dennis Canavan*, Alex Neil*
S2M-4050 Renaming of Prestwick International Airport (lodged on 2 March 2006) Dr Jean Turner*
S2M-4050 Renaming of Prestwick International Airport (lodged on 2 March 2006) Linda Fabiani*
S2M-4050 Renaming of Prestwick International Airport (lodged on 2 March 2006) Cathy Peattie*
S2M-4050 Renaming of Prestwick International Airport (lodged on 2 March 2006) Frances Curran*
